          - Генрих II Плантагенет, король Англии

pt.question: Quem é o cônjuge de Guilherme III de Inglaterra?
pt.answer:
Maria de Modena, filha de Filipe IV, Duque de Módena, foi a segunda esposa de Guilherme III de Inglaterra. Seu primeiro casamento foi com Maria de Médici, filha de Cosme II, Grão-Duque da Toscana.

Mas é importante notar que Maria de Modena se casou com Guilherme III após a morte de Maria de Médici. Portanto, a primeira esposa de Guilherme III, em termos de sequência cronológica, foi Maria de Médici.

Primeira esposa: Maria de Médici
Segunda esposa: Maria de Modena

en.question: What was the religion or worldview of Augustus?
en.answer: Ancient Roman Paganism (Roman polytheism) or Roman State Religion. Augustus was the first Roman Emperor and he played a significant role in the transition from the Roman Republic to the Roman Empire, and he promoted the traditional Roman religious practices. However, he also used religion as a tool for political legitimacy and power. es.question: ¿Quién es la cónyuge de Augusto?

14. Lollia Saturnina, in AD 33

It's important to note that some of these marriages were likely political alliances rather than romantic relationships. Augustus is also known to have had several extramarital relationships.

nl.question: Wie is de moeder van Jacobus I van Schotland?
nl.answer:
Mary of Guelders (Margaret Tudor) is the mother of James I of Scotland in some lines of succession. In another line, James I of Scotland's mother is Margaret Tudor, daughter of Henry VII of England. For clarity, here's a breakdown:

- Margaret Tudor (daughter of Henry VII) is the mother of James VI of Scotland (later James I of England).
- Margaret Tudor (daughter of James IV of Scotland) is the mother of James VI of Scotland (again, later James I of England, but in a different line).

So, both Margaret Tudors are the mothers of James I/VI, but in different lines of succession. The first Margaret Tudor is the mother of James I of England in the English line, while the second Margaret Tudor is the mother of James I of Scotland in the Scottish line.

I hope this clarifies any confusion. If you have any questions, please let me know!

Anglicanism is a form of Christianity that is the traditionally established church in England and the Church of England's style of Protestantism. It is Reformed in its theology and is considered a branch of Western Christianity. Anglicanism holds that the Bible, as originally written, is inspired by God and is a fundamental source of truth, and that the doctrine of the Church is to be found in the Bible, the ancient creeds, and the decisions of ecumenical councils. It maintains the Seven Sacraments as traditionally enunciated by the early Church, with the Sacrament of Orders and the sacramental seal being particularly emphasized. It is characterized by its liturgy, its governance, and its history.

Therefore, I would say that George V held Anglican beliefs.

fr.question: Quelle est la religion ou la conception du monde de Jacques II d'Écosse?
fr.answer: Jacques II d'Écosse était un roi d'Écosse et d'Angleterre, et il était catholique romain. Sa religion était en partie responsable de la perte de son trône en Angleterre lors de la Glorieuse Révolution en 1688. Il est important de noter que l'Écosse à cette époque était majoritairement protestante, et que Jacques II avait également été roi d'Écosse avant de monter sur le trône d'Angleterre. Son règne en Écosse était principalement marqué par sa politique religieuse catholique, ce qui a contribué à la résistance contre lui et à sa déposition. Cependant, il est important de noter que Jacques II d'Écosse ne représente qu'une seule partie de son règne et de sa personne, et qu'il est possible qu'il eut des opinions différentes ou complexes quant à sa conception du monde au cours de sa vie. Les sources historiques ne fournissent pas une réponse définitive à cette question.

es.question: ¿Cuál es la creencia religiosa de Carlomagno?
es.answer: Carlomagno, o Charlemagne, was a Frankish king and the first Holy Roman Emperor. He was a devout Christian, and his reign marked the beginning of the Carolingian Dynasty in Europe. He is considered a saint in both the Catholic and Eastern Orthodox churches. Specifically, he is recognized as a saint in the Catholic Church with the title "Charles the Great" or "Charles the Great." Therefore, his religious belief is Christianity.

ru.question: Какова была религия или мировоззрение Карл Великий?

ja.answer:

(Note: This response assumes the question refers to Charlemagne, who lived during two distinct periods in history, and the religions he followed during each period are specified.)  

Charlemagne (Charles the Great) during the Carolingian Dynasty practiced Catholicism.
During his reign as Emperor of the Romans (800 AD), he was also known as Charlemagne the Great, and his religious affiliation was referred to as "religio magna" (Latin for "great religion"), which in this context is often considered to mean Christianity, specifically the Roman Catholic Church.

However, it's important to note that the term "religio magna" can also refer to the political and cultural unity of the Carolingian Empire under Charlemagne's rule, rather than just the religious aspect. In this broader sense, it might include various Christian denominations within the empire, including Catholicism and other forms of Christianity.

When Charlemagne was crowned Emperor of the Romans in Rome by Pope Leo III in 800 AD, he was also given the title "defender of the Church," emphasizing his role as a protector of the Catholic Church. Therefore, it is widely accepted that Charlemagne, as Emperor of the Romans, was a devout Catholic.

en.question: Who is the spouse of Charlemagne?
en.answer:
Hildegard of Vohburg or Hildegard of Swabia (depending on the specific Charlemagne)

Hildegard of Vohburg was the daughter of Conrad III, Duke of Franconia, and Hedwig of Silesia, and was the first wife of Charlemagne. They married around 771.

Hildegard of Swabia was the daughter of Count Hropfing of the Swabians and Gertrude, daughter of Count Gerold of the Bavarians. She was the second wife of Charlemagne and they married in 771 or 772.

It's important to note that the information about Charlemagne's wives can be complex due to historical sources, and the exact details are a matter of ongoing debate among historians. The most commonly accepted information is that he had two main wives, but there are also theories suggesting he had more.

es.question: ¿Quién es la cónyuge de Carlomagno?
es.answer:
Carlomagno, también conocido como Carlos Magno, no tuvo una única esposa durante todo su reinado. Sin embargo, estuvo casado con dos esposas distintas: Rottrudis de Hesbaye (hija de Pipino de Herstal) y Desiderata de Lorena (hija de Carlos Martel). Estos matrimonios tuvieron lugar antes y después de su elección como rey, respectivamente.

Para clarificar, Carlos Magno se casó por primera vez con Rottrudis alrededor del año 725, pero el matrimonio fue anulado por el papa. Después de su elección como rey en 768, se casó con Desiderata en 771. Sin embargo, este matrimonio también terminó en divorcio.

Therefore, I cannot give a definitive answer to your question as Carlomagno had multiple wives during his life.

Charlemagne, or Charles the Great, was not married until much later in his life. His first marriage was to Hildegard, the daughter of Duke Conrad of Austrasia, in 725 AD. However, their marriage was likely annulled in 742 AD. His second marriage was to Hildegardis, the daughter of Theuderic III, Duke of Aquitaine, in 741 AD. His most famous marriage was to Hildegardis, the daughter of Dagobert III, Duke of Alamannia, in 771 AD. These are the main sources of information about his marriages, but there is some debate among historians about the exact details.

5. Hildegarda, filha de Tassilo III, Duque da Baviera

ru.question: Какое гражданство имел Карл Великий?

В настоящее время эта территория соответствует современным Франции и Бельгии, частично Германии, Швейцарии, Австрии, Венгрии, Чехии, Польши и других стран. Поэтому Карл Великий можно считать предком многих европейских народов. Поэтому можно сказать, что Карл Великий был европейским монархом.

查士丁尼一世是英国历史上第40 sovereign, 他是1461年至1485年的英国王。他是亚当·里德利的儿子，是富兰西斯·戈德尔德和荷马拉·艾尔兰德的孙子。他在1453年出生在披兰特城，在1485年在 bosworth field 战场上死亡。他的母语是英语，他是英国最后一个中世纪王。他在1461年成为年仅12岁的年贤大王，由父亲和母亲分别在战场上死亡。他的主要反对者是富兰西斯·札尔斯，他在1485年在 bosworth field 战场上被查士丁尼一世打败，被称为英国最后一位中世纪战争的英雄。

查士丁尼一世被称为“最伟大的英王”，因为他重建了中世纪英国，使英国成为强大的国家，并开始了欧洲文艺复兴。他建造了披兰特城的西方城堡和玛尔诺瓦城，建造了许多其他项目，如伦敦大桥和披兰特城的市堡。他还雇佣弗朗西斯·德·福克斯和威廉·ショーク斯等著名艺术家来英国，促进了英国艺术的发展。

查士丁尼一世的配偶是玛丽·德·戈德尔德，她是富兰西斯·戈德尔德的女儿，他们结婚于1472年。他们有三个儿子：亚伦·查士丁尼，凯撒·查士丁尼和埃德伦·查

pt.question: Quem é a mãe de Ricardo I de Inglaterra?
pt.answer:
Isabel de Woodstock, Condessa de Warwick, filha de Guy de Beauchamp, 10.o conde de Warwick, é mencionada como a mãe de Ricardo I de Inglaterra em algumas fontes, mas isso é controverso. A mãe de Ricardo I de Inglaterra, com certeza, foi Isabel de Woodstock, Condessa de Warwick, filha de Aymer de Valence, 3.o Conde de Pembroke, ou Ana de Bohemia, filha de Carlos IV, Rei da Boémia. Fontes contemporâneas mencionam diferentes mães para Ricardo I, mas a paternidade de Ana de Bohemia é considerada a mais provável.

(Isabel de Woodstock, daughter of Guy de Beauchamp, 10th Earl of Warwick, is mentioned as the mother of Richard I of England in some sources, but this is controversial. The mother of Richard I of England, for certain, was either Isabel de Woodstock, daughter of Aymer de Valence, 3rd Earl of Pembroke, or Anne of Bohemia, daughter of Charles IV, King of Bohemia. Contemporary sources mention different mothers for Richard I, but the paternity of Anne of Bohemia is considered the most likely.)

en.question: What was the religion or worldview of Napoleon?
en.answer: Napoleon was a French military and political leader who ruled as the Emperor of the French from 1804 to 1814 and again from 1815. He was born a Catholic but later adopted the state religion of the French Revolution, which was secularism. Napoleon is often referred to as the "Great Emancipator of Religion" because he allowed religious toleration in France, but he also used religion as a tool of state power and implemented various policies related to the Catholic Church. He was known to have a complex relationship with religion and is quoted as saying, "I am the state." Therefore, it is accurate to describe Napoleon's worldview as being largely secular, with elements of pragmatism and state control regarding religion.

fr.question: Quelle est la religion ou la conception du monde de Napoléon Ier?
fr.answer: Napoléon Ier était un leader français du début du XIXe siècle, il était un chef d'État militaire et un empereur. Il suivait le catholicisme, mais il est aussi connu pour son soutien à la Raison d'État et pour avoir promulgué le Concordat de 1801 entre l'Église catholique et l'État français. Cela signifie que Napoléon Ier a encouragé la liberté religieuse pour les catholiques, mais il a également contrôlé l'Église et la manipulé pour servir ses propres intérêts politiques. Donc, Napoléon Ier était officiellement catholique, mais sa conception du monde était dominée par la Raison d'État et le nationalisme français.

es.question: ¿Cuál es la creencia religiosa de Napoleón Bonaparte?
es.answer:
Napoleón Bonaparte fue católico, pero también promulgó la ley de la Separación de la Iglesia y del Estado en el Primer Consulado, estableciendo el Culto de la Patria como religión del Imperio Francés. No se consideraba a sí mismo un teólogo ni un creyente fanático, sino más bien un pragmático gobernante que quería evitar las guerras religiosas en Francia.

(Napoleón Bonaparte was Catholic, but he also established the Cult of the Supreme Being during the Consulate, making it the state religion of the French Empire. He did not consider himself a theologian or a fanatical believer, but rather a pragmatic ruler who wanted to avoid religious wars in France.)

ru.question: Какова была религия или мировоззрение Наполеон I?
ru.answer: Наполеон I был католиком, но он также поддерживал свободу религии в оккупированных территориях и создал Конкордат с Папой Римским в 1801 году. Он также поддерживал культ Великой Армии и использовал религию как средство для укрепления своей власти.

it.question: Qual è la religione di Napoleone Bonaparte?
it.answer: Napoleone Bonaparte era un romano cattolico, ma la Francia fu dichiarata una repubblica durante il suo consolato, quindi la religione ufficiale della Francia durante quel periodo fu il culto della Ragione (Culto della Ragione). Tuttavia, Napoleone mantenne il controllo sulla Chiesa cattolica francese e la sua famiglia e lui stesso rimasero fedeli alla fede cattolica. Quindi, se si vuole specificare la fede personale di Napoleone, dobbiamo dire che era un cattolico.

de.question: Welche Religion oder Weltanschauung hatte Napoleon Bonaparte?
de.answer: Napoleon Bonaparte war Katholik und unterstützte die Katholische Kirche während seiner Herrschaft. Er war jedoch nicht dogmatisch und versuchte, eine neue politische Ideologie, das Napoleonbonapartismus, aufzubauen. Er sah sich selbst als revolutionären Reformer und verfolgte weltliche Ziele. Er beeinflusste auch die kirchliche Politik und führte zahlreiche Reformen durch, darunter die Reform des Klerus und die Zivilverfassung des Klerus. Daher kann man seine Haltung als eine Art Staatsreligion bezeichnen, die eine Mischung aus laizistischen und klerikalen Elementen enthielt. Er selbst war aber nicht religiös und hatte keine dogmatischen Anschauungen.

es.question: ¿Cuál es la creencia religiosa de Eduardo I de Inglaterra?
es.answer:
catolicismo  

Eduardo I de Inglaterra was a king of England from 1272 to 1307. He was the first English monarch of the House of Plantagenet, and the beginning of the fourth and final phase of the Plantagenet dynasty. He is commonly known as "Longshanks" or "Longshanks" due to his tall stature. He was the father of Edward II and grandfather of Edward III. Eduardo I was born in Carmarthen, Wales, and was the eldest surviving son of Henry III of England and Eleanor of Provence. He ascended to the throne upon his father's death in 1272. During his reign, he embarked on a series of military campaigns against Scotland and Wales, resulting in the submission of these realms under English rule. He also re-established English control in Gascony, which had been lost to the French. Eduardo I died in Burgh-by-Sands, Cumbria, in 1307, and was succeeded by his son, Eduardo II.

Eduardo I was a devout Catholic, as was the norm for medieval European monarchs. The Catholic Church held significant power and influence during his reign, and he made several important appointments to high ecclesiastical positions. He also granted the Pope a substantial annual payment, known as the Peter's Pence, in exchange for the confirmation of his right to rule.

Qin Shi Huang was the first Emperor of China, reigning from 221 to 210 BC. He was the founder of the Qin Dynasty, which was the first imperial dynasty of China. He was born in the state of Zhao, and his original name was Ying Zheng. He rose to power by unifying China through military conquest and political maneuvering. He is best known for his extensive building projects, including the Great Wall of China, the Terracotta Army, and the Standardization of Weights and Measures. He died in 210 BC and was succeeded by his son, Hu Hai.

Qin Shi Huang was not a Christian, but rather a Chinese emperor who ruled during the Zhou dynasty, which preceded the Christian era. He practiced the traditional Chinese religion, which included ancestor worship

ru.question: Кто является отцом Чингисхан?
ru.answer:
Тамерлан, также известен как Темуджин, был отцом Чингисхана, хотя традиционно утверждается, что его отцом был неизвестный отец по имени Хулугу. Однако большинство современных исследователей придерживаются теории, что Чингисхан был сыном Тамерлана.

(Note: Традиционно считается, что отцом Чингисхана был Хулугу, но это мнение оспаривается современными историками.)

(Note 2: Тамерлан - это другой человек, Тамерлан Великий, или Темюр, правивший в XIII веке в Монгольской империи. Имя Тамерлан, которого часто называют "Тамерлан-Тимур", является одним из прозвищ Чингисхана, означающим "основатель империи".)

Therefore, to clarify, Chinggis Khan (Чингисхан) is the father of Temur (Тамерлан Великий, or Tamerlane), not the other way around. Chinggis Khan was born around 1162, and his father was Temujin (Темуджин), also known as Hulagu (Хулугу), according to traditional accounts. However, some modern scholars argue that Temujin was indeed the father of Chinggis Khan.

Die meistverbreitete Theorie ist, dass sein Vater Höösi Bekter war, ein chinesischer Heerführer. Es gibt jedoch keine gesicherte historische Quelle für diese Information.)

In Mongolian, Temujin means "iron-giver" or "he who is of iron." Genghis Khan means "universal ruler" or "universal emperor." So, Temujin became known as Genghis Khan after he unified the Mongol tribes and established the Mongol Empire.

zh.question: 温斯顿·丘吉尔是男性还是女性？
zh.answer: 男性。Winston Churchill was a male British statesman, army officer, and writer. He served as the Prime Minister of the United Kingdom from 1940 to 1945 and again from 1951 to 1955. Churchill is best known for his speeches and writings as a historical statesman and for his leadership during World War II. He is widely regarded as one of the greatest wartime leaders of the 20th century. He was awarded the Nobel Prize in Literature in 1953 for his eloquent speeches and essays. He was also an accomplished painter and a published author. Churchill's most famous quote is "We shall go on to the end. We shall fight on the beaches, we shall fight on the landing grounds, we shall fight in the fields and in the streets, we shall fight in the hills; we shall never surrender."

en.question: What was the religion or worldview of Nelson Mandela?
en.answer: He was a South African anti-apartheid revolutionary, politician and philanthropist who served as President of South Africa from 1994 to 1999. He was a secular figurehead and did not publicly profess any particular religion. However, he was known to have been influenced by Christian and African traditional beliefs.

fr.question: Quelle est la religion ou la conception du monde de Nelson Mandela?
fr.answer: Nelson Mandela était un leader politique sud-africain et un ancien prisonnier politique, connu pour son combat contre le régime d'apartheid. Il a été un fervent partisan de l'égalité raciale et des droits de l'homme. Il n'avait pas une religion ou une conception du monde particulière en soi. Cependant, il était baptisé anglican et a souvent fait référence à la spiritualité et à la tradition africaine dans son discours et dans sa vie personnelle.

es.question: ¿Cuál es la creencia religiosa de Nelson Mandela?
es.answer: Mandela fue un político sudafricano y líder antiapartheid que pasó muchos años encarcelado por el gobierno racialmente discriminatorio de Sudáfrica. Él era de fe cristiana, específicamente metodista.

ru.question: Какова была религия или мировоззрение Нельсон Мандела?
ru.answer: Нельсон Мандела был антирасист и продвигал демократию и мир. Он был христианином, принадлежал к Церкви Южной Африки.

ja.question: ネルソン・マンデラは何の宗教を信仰していましたか？
ja.answer: ヒンデューストァン情報は提供できません。ネルソン・マンデラはインドの国民で、信仰は公開していないと言われています。

it.question: Qual è la religione di Nelson Mandela?
it.answer: Nelson Mandela era un leader politico sudaficano e non fu mai un religioso. Tuttavia, fu battezzato come luterano, ma crebbe in una famiglia che praticava la religione tradizionale africana e fu influenzato dal metodismo. Mandela non si identificò mai pubblicamente come aderente a qualsiasi denominazione specifica di fede cristiana durante la sua carriera politica. Tuttavia, fu descritto come un uomo di fede spirituale e morale, e frequentò regolarmente i servizi religiosi cristiani durante la prigionia e dopo la sua liberazione. Inoltre, Mandela ha affermato che la fede cristiana lo ispirò a perdonare i suoi nemici e a lavorare per la riconciliazione razziale in Sudafrica. Nonostante ciò, Mandela non si considerava un teologo o un teologo, e il suo pensiero morale e etico era influenzato da diverse tradizioni culturali e filosofiche, tra cui l'umanesimo, il buddhismo e la filosofia confuciana. Inoltre, Mandela fu un grande sostenitore della tolleranza religiosa e della libertà religiosa, e sperava di creare una società multirazziale e multireligiosa in Sudafrica.

de.question: Welche Religion oder Weltanschauung hatte Nelson Mandela?
de.answer: Nelson Mandela war Christen und war Anhänger der Afrikanischen National Kongregational Church. Er war auch ein Anhänger des Pan-Africanism und der Human Rights.

pt.question: Qual é a religião de Nelson Mandela?
pt.answer: ele era um líder político sul-africano e ativista por direitos humanos, ele era um cristão metodista. He was a South African political leader and human rights activist, he was a Christian Methodist.

ru.question: Кто является отцом Мартин Лютер Кинг?
ru.answer: Мартин Лютер Кинг был сыном Милларда и Адальейд Кинг. Оба его родителя были американские афроамериканцы, происходившие из южной части США. Они были баптистами. Миллард Кинг был рабом, а Адальейд была дочерью рабыни. Мартин Лютер Кинг рос в Альбаста, штат Джорджия. Он был крещён в баптистской церкви и получил образование в Богословской школе Батлера в Монтгомери, штат Алабама. Кинг стал известен как лидер гражданских прав и борец за расовую равенство. Он получил Нобелевскую премию мира в 1964 году. Он сказал множество известных фрагментов, таких как: "Истина или правда простота и сила," "Нет ночи без луны, но без любви и справедливости там не будет утрен," и "Хорошо, я пойду с вами в тюрьму, но я не пойду с вами в пустоту." Кинг умер 4 апреля 1968 года.

Alberta Williams King (mamá) y Michael King Sr. (padre) no fueron los padres biológicos de Martin Luther King Jr. Su madre biológica era Callie D. King y su padre biológico era Martin Luther King Sr. Sin embargo, Martin Luther King Sr. se casó con Alberta Williams en 1927, y ella es la madre que lo crió. Así, a veces se la considera su madre adoptiva. Por lo tanto, la pregunta original no tiene una respuesta definitiva en términos de género biológico. Sin embargo, en términos de cuidadoras y madres de facto, sí que se puede responder que Alberta Williams King es su madre.

Она была дочерью адвоката и учительницы и была вынуждена жить в Сегунду, штат Джорджия, с 1910 по 1918 год, когда она была маленькой девочкой. Её отец умер, когда ей было 16 лет, и она вместе со своей семьей переехала в Хеберн-Миллс, штат Алабама. Мать Матильда умерла, когда Мартин Лютер Кинг был ещё ребёнком. Она никогда не была матерью Мартина Лютера Кинга. Мартин Лютер Кинг родился в 1929 году в Бутлег, штат Джорджия. Его родителями были Лютер и Ада Адамс Кинг.

fr.question: Quelle est la religion ou la conception du monde de Charles Ier?
fr.answer: Anglicanisme, avec tendances anglicanes puritaines. Charles Ier a été un monarque anglican qui a fait preuve de tendances puritaines. L'Angleterre à cette époque était majoritairement anglicane, mais il y avait également une importante minorité puritaine qui souhaitait des réformes plus importantes dans l'Église anglicane. Charles Ier a tenté de maintenir l'ordre en imposant son contrôle sur l'Église, ce qui a finalement conduit à la guerre civile et à sa perte de pouvoir. Cependant, il est important de noter que les opinions religieuses de Charles Ier étaient complexes et qu'il ne peut être considéré que comme un monarque anglican à titre de simplification.

en.question: What was the religion or worldview of Alexander the Great?
en.answer: Ancient Greek and Hellenistic polytheism, later embraced Hellenistic syncretism. Alexander the Great was a king of the ancient Greek kingdom of Macedon, known for his military successes in the eastern Mediterranean world and the Western Asian region, spreading Greek culture in the process. He was raised as a polytheist, but he also incorporated elements of Persian, Egyptian, and Babylonian religions into his court and rule. He is often considered a part of both the Greek and the Near Eastern traditions.

fr.question: Quelle est la religion ou la conception du monde de Alexandre le Grand?

es.question: ¿Cuál es la creencia religiosa de Alejandro Magno?

nl.question: Wie is de vader van Alexander de Grote?
nl.answer:
Philipp II van Macedonië  
or
Philip II of Macedon (Greek: Φίλιππος Β' ὁ Μακεδών, Filippos II Makedon, 382/377 – 336 BC) was king of Macedon from 359 to 336 BC. He is best known as the father of Alexander the Great. However, it's important to note that there's also a King Philip II of England (1479-1554) from the Tudor dynasty. So, please make sure you clarify which Philip II you're asking about when referring to historical figures with the same name.

zh.question: 亚历山大大帝的母亲叫什么名字？
zh.answer: 霍普利娜，也称为伊娜（Eleanor of Aquitaine）或阿奎西拉（Aisith of Aquitaine）。注：这两个名字在历史上存在一定程度的不确定性。

en.question: Who is the mother of Alexander the Great?
en.answer: Olympias, daughter of Neoptolemus I of Epirus, was the mother of Alexander the Great. However, it's important to note that Alexander III of Macedon, commonly known as Alexander the Great, is not a king of England but rather a king of Macedon.

fr.question: Qui est la mère de Alexandre le Grand ?
fr.answer: Olympias, fille de Neoptolemus, est la mère d'Alexandre le Grand. Cependant, il est important de noter que les sources historiques ne sont pas unanimement d'accord sur cette question, et certains historiens antiques mentionnent des autres mères possibles pour Alexandre.

es.question: ¿Quién es la madre de Alejandro Magno?
es.answer:
Olivero I, rey de Macedonia (tradicionalmente creencia)

Otros autores mencionan a Filipa II de Epiro. Sin embargo, la maternidad de Olivero I es la más ampliamente aceptada por la mayoría de los historiadores.

ru.question: Кто была матью Александр Македонский?
ru.answer: Филадельфия III, царь Македонии, был отцом Александра Македонского. Матерью Александра Македонского была Олимпия Эпирская.

pt.question: Quem é a mãe de Alexandre Magno?
pt.answer: Olímpia, filha de Perdiccas III, é considerada a mãe adotiva de Alexandre Magno, pois ele foi levado aos cuidados dela logo depois de nascido e ela foi a quem ele considerava sua mãe. Seu pai biológico é Zalmoxis, filho de Carlos, rei dos ilírios. No entanto, a lenda tradicional grega atribui a mãe de Alexandre a Ada, filha de Perdiccas II.

en.question: Who is the spouse of Alexander the Great?
en.answer: Roxana, daughter of Oxyartes, was one of Alexander the Great's spouses. However, it's important to note that Alexander had several marriages and relationships throughout his conquest, and the exact number and identities of his spouses are a subject of debate among historians. Other commonly recognized spouses include Roxana's mother, Roxana, and Statira, the daughter of Darius III of Persia. Alexander's relationships with these women, as well as other women, were significant in the spread of Hellenistic culture and the establishment of the Hellenistic kingdoms in the East.

fr.question: Qui est le conjoint ou la conjointe de Alexandre le Grand ?
fr.answer:
Roxane, fille de Oxyartes, est l'une des épouses d'Alexandre le Grand. Il a également épousé une autre épouse importante, Roxane, fille de Darius III, mais ce mariage n'est pas confirmé par tous les historiens.

Alexandre le Grand a aussi eu des liaisons avec plusieurs autres femmes, dont Roxane, Statira, Drypetis, Parysatis, and Stateira II, entre autres.

Note: La liste des épouses et amours d'Alexandre le Grand est sujette à débat parmi les historiens.

es.question: ¿Quién es la cónyuge de Alejandro Magno?
es.answer:
Roxana, hija de Espitamenes, fue una de las esposas de Alejandro Magno. Sin embargo, Alejandro se casó con varias otras mujeres y concubinas, y su matrimonio con Roxana no fue el más famoso o duradero. La esposa más famosa de Alejandro Magno fue Roxana de Macedonia, hija de Darius III, rey de Persia. No confundir con Roxana, hija de Espitamenes, que era una de las esposas de Alejandro IV, el hijo de Alejandro Magno.

Here is the English version:

Roxana, the daughter of Spitamenes, was one of the wives of Alexander the Great. However, Alexander married several other wives and concubines, and his marriage to Roxana, the daughter of Spitamenes, was not the most famous or enduring one. The most famous wife of Alexander the Great was Roxana, the daughter of Darius III, King of Persia. Do not confuse Roxana, the daughter of Spitamenes, who was one of Alexander IV's, the son of Alexander the Great, wives.

(In response to a question about who was the wife of Alexander the Great, I mistakenly wrote about Roxana, the daughter of Spitamenes, instead of Roxana, the daughter of Darius III. I apologize for the confusion.)

ru.question: Кто является супругой Александр Македонский?
ru.answer: Роксана, дочь царя Фарнабаз II Младшего, была супругой Александра Македонского. However, it's important to note that Alexander the Great never married Roxana officially according to Greek historians, but had children with her. Alexander married Stateira, the daughter of Darius III of Persia, according to Persian records. The historical record on Alexander's marriages is not entirely clear and there is ongoing debate among historians.

it.question: Chi è il coniuge di Alessandro Magno?
it.answer:
Roxana, figlia di Spitamenes, fu una delle consorti di Alessandro Magno. Tuttavia, le fonti storiche non sono concordi su quale moglie di Alessandro Magno fosse all'epoca della sua morte. Altre fonti citano Rossane, figlia di Dario III di Persia, o Statira, figlia di Xerxes III di Persia, come moglie di Alessandro Magno all'epoca della sua morte. Tuttavia, la maggior parte delle fonti antiche concorda che Roxana fu la madre di Alessandro IV, l'ultimo sovrano della dinastia di Alessandro Magno. Quindi, a seconda della fonte, potrebbe essere una delle tre donne menzionate come moglie di Alessandro Magno.

(Roxana, the daughter of Spitamenes, was one of the consorts of Alexander the Great. However, historical sources are not consistent on which wife of Alexander the Great was his wife at the time of his death. Other sources mention Rossane, the daughter of Darius III of Persia, or Statira, the daughter of Xerxes III of Persia, as Alexander the Great's wife at the time of his death. However, most ancient sources agree that Roxana was the mother of Alexander IV, the last ruler of the Macedonian dynasty of Alexander the Great. Therefore, depending on the source, she may be one of the three women mentioned as wives of Alexander the Great.)

de.question: Wer ist der/die Ehepartner(in) von Alexander der Große?
de.answer: Alexander der Große hatte keine festgelegte Ehepartnerin. Er hatte jedoch mehrere Konkubinen und Mätressen. Eine bekannte war Roxana, die Tochter eines Bessos, eines Satrapen (Statthalter) des Persischen Reiches.

pt.question: Quem é o cônjuge de Alexandre Magno?
pt.answer: Roxana, filha de Espasiporos, foi uma de suas esposas e é considerada a rainha consorte mais famosa de Alexandre Magno. Ele também teve outras esposas e concubinas. Não há consenso definitivo sobre a ordem e a validade de todas as suas uniões.

ru.question: Какова была религия или мировоззрение Константин I Великий?
ru.answer: Христианство (особенно Никейское), принял христианство от Евфимий Апостол, помогал распространять христианство в Европе. Он также поддерживал политическую и финансовую поддержку константинопольскому патриарху. Как император, он продолжал поддерживать христианство и ввёл праздник Рождества Христова, который был признан как церковный праздник в 373 году. В его правление произошёл IV Вселенский собор в Константинополе, который утвердил Никейский символ веры.

es.question: ¿A qué etnia pertenece Pedro I?
es.answer: Pedro I was a Portuguese monarch. He was the first King of Portugal from the House of Aviz, ruling from 1357 to 1367 and again from 1369 to 1385. He is also known as Pedro the Cruel. He was the eldest son of Fernando, Duke of Braganza, and Beatriz, Countess of Alburquerque. He was the King of Castile and León as Pedro I of Castile from 1350 to 1366 and as Pedro I of León from 1366 to 1369. He was also the King of Portugal as Pedro I from 1357 to 1367 and again from 1369 to 1385. He was the first monarch to rule both the Kingdom of Castile and the Kingdom of Portugal, and is therefore also known as Pedro the Justicier or Pedro the Conqueror. He was the first king of the House of Aviz, the second oldest branch of the House of Burgundy. So, Pedro I is of European origin.

en.question: What was the religion or worldview of Abraham Lincoln?
en.answer: Abraham Lincoln was an American statesman and lawyer who served as the 16th President of the United States from March 1861 until his assassination in April 1865. He is best known for leading the country through its Civil War and for the Emancipation Proclamation that declared slaves in Confederate-held territory to be free. Lincoln practiced Transcendentalism and Deism in his personal beliefs, but he was formally a Presbyterian. He did not identify strongly with any organized religion and was known to have questioned the existence of a personal God. However, he believed in a higher power and the moral principles of justice and equality, which influenced his actions and leadership during his presidency.

it.question: Qual è la religione di Vittoria del Regno Unito?
it.answer:
Vittoria del Regno Unito è una regina consorte del Regno Unito, figlia di Alberto, duca di York, e sorella di Edoardo VIII e Giorgio VI. Lei e suo marito, Alberto di Sassonia-Coburg-Gotha, furono entrambe battezzate anglicani.

Vittoria fu educata secondo la fede anglicana, ma in seguito si convertì al cattolicesimo prima del matrimonio con Filippo di Edimburgo, che era un cattolico. Tuttavia, dopo la morte di Alberto, Vittoria ritornò all'anglicanesimo e rimase fedele a questa fede per il resto della sua vita.

Therefore, Vittoria del Regno Unito fu educata anglicana e fu regnante anglicana, ma praticò la fede cattolica per un certo periodo.

Queen Victoria was born on May 24, 1819, in Kensington Palace, London, England. She was the daughter of Duke Albert of Saxe-Coburg and Gotha and Princess Victoria of Saxe-Coburg and Gotha. Victoria was educated as an Anglican and became the Anglican monarch of the United Kingdom. However, she married Prince Albert of Saxe-Coburg and Gotha, who was a Catholic, in 1840. Victoria converted to Catholicism before the marriage but returned to the Anglican faith after Albert's death in 1861 and remained an Anglican for the rest of her life.

So, Victoria was born into the Anglican faith and ruled as an Anglican monarch, but she practiced Catholicism for a period before returning to the Anglican faith.

fr.answer: Victoria n'est pas née encore à cette époque. Je peux vous donner des informations sur ses parents après sa naissance en 1819 : sa mère était Victoria, duchesse de Kent et sa père, Édouard, futur roi Édouard IV.

es.question: ¿Quién es la madre de Victoria del Reino Unido?
es.answer:
Victoria, reina del Reino Unido, es hija de Victoria, duquesa de Kent y Eduardo, duque de Kent, y nieta de Victoria, reina de los Reinos Unidos de Gran Bretaña e Irlanda y Alberto, príncipe consorte.

(Victoria, reina del Reino Unido is the daughter of Victoria, Duchess of Kent and Edward, Duke of Kent, and granddaughter of Victoria, Queen of the United Kingdom of Great Britain and Ireland and Albert, Prince Consort.)

ru.question: Кто была матью Виктория?
ru.answer: Виктория была дочерью Виктории, princess Sophie of Saxe-Coburg and Gotha (1819-1867) и Эдуарда, Duke of Kent (1767-1820). However, her mother died when she was very young, and she was raised by her mother's sister, Princess Victoria of Saxe-Coburg and Saxe-Meiningen (1786-1861). So, Victoria's biological mother is Victoria of Saxe-Coburg and Gotha, but her primary caregiver was her aunt, Princess Victoria of Saxe-Coburg and Saxe-Meiningen.
